title: The Real Price of a London Apartment Has Sunk 22% in the Last Decade
description: For years, Britain’s young professionals have faced a dilemma: the best job opportunities are in a city that has some of the world’s most exorbitant house prices.
content: For years, Britain’s young professionals have faced a dilemma: the best job opportunities are in a city that has some of the world’s most exorbitant house prices.
